name: Candy Jump Hero
description:
Come play our fun candy jumping game with cool characters! Highly addictive. How far can you get?

- Tap into the world of Candy Jump where you explore the colourful world filled with sugar. But watch out for the many dangers that can stop you in your path!
-Candy Jump is an endless jump game that you will enjoy for hours.
- Choose from four cute characters!
- Avoid enemies and pick up power ups to complete the journey

Thanks for you playing this game
